Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
Almost all Log4j 2 versions were affected, starting with version 2.0 through 2.14.1.

Log4j of version 1 does not have the issue.

As a result, OpenCms versions <= 10.5.x are not affected since they integrate a Log4j library of version 1.

For OpenCms versions > 10.5.x it is absolutely necessary to replace the Log4j Java libraries with a newer version.
